short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension creates Cumulative Flow Diagrams based on Jira Queries.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension creates Cumulative Flow Diagrams based on Jira Queries. Weekends are and further non working days can be excluded. The created diagrams can be shared via a link.

Further documentation is available at: https://github.com/jpieringer/jira-cumulative-flow-diagram
